Desc.entry: Free Wi-Fi internet access for customers with their own wireless enabled lap-top at the following locations: Moco Caf√©, 202 West Street, S1 4EU, Tel 0114 276 7474; The Showroom Cinema, Paternoster Row, S1 2BX, Tel 0114 276 3534 (Mon-Thur 10am-11pm, Fri 10am-12midnight, Sat 11am-12midnight, Sun 12noon-10.30pm); Silversmiths, 111 Arundel Street, S1 2NT, Tel 0114 270 6160 (Mon-Sat 5.30pm-12midnight).
